Attributes.description: The process of marketing research including problem/opportunity formulation, research objectives, data sources, research instrument design, sampling, data collection and processing and methods of data analysis.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of ECON 315, ECON 316 or (b) ECON 308.
